entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MissingMethodException after changing method signature on hot reload #87032
  • Track the New Dynamic Heap Configurations via the GC Configuration API. #87030
  • GC Dynamic adaptation to app sizes: Support configuration using MSBuild property #87028
  • coreclr.dll threw access violation exception #87027
  • TagList.GetEnumerator() allocates #87022
  • Enable relevant thread pool events in Windows #87020
    8.0.0
  • Build method of ConfigurationBuilder taking too much time while initializing pods under kubernetes #87018
    Future
  • Microsoft DI resolves enumerables incorrectly when a matching ServiceType has already been resolved #87017
  • [JIT] Splitting `instrDesc` for EVEX encoded instruction #87016
  • Difference in X509Chain output on Linux and Windows #87010
  • Consider making HTTP diagnostic event payload strongly typed with public types #87008
  • JsonExtensionDataAttribute not working with custom overflow converters in source gen #87005
    Future
  • StringComparer.OrdinalIgnoreCase.Equals is not unrolled for literals #86999
    8.0.0
  • Explicit static interface implementation compiles but program crashes with "Fatal error" with .NET 7 #86993
  • Dynamic heap count perf regressions #87014
  • GlobalInstanceTrackerSupportTests_TargetUnix failing #86990
  • Add analyzer to flag string comparisons without an explicit comparer/comparison #86989

Closed

  • MAUI failed to compile with AOT #81913
  • dotnet publish ends after hours with buffer overflow when publishing dotnet maui app. #81271
  • Wasm.Build.Tests.Blazor tests could not find blazor's dotnetjs #87024
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Net.Tests.Perf_WebUtility on arm64 #84787
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/arm64: 7 Regressions on 1/13/2023 3:30:06 PM #80871
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions from flow graph reordering change #70159
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Text.Perf_Utf8Encoding #68405
    8.0.0
  • RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan support is failing in some circumstances #79477
    7.0.x
  • Configuration source generator broken when not supplying BinderOptions #86654
    8.0.0
  • Assert failure in GC/API/NoGCRegion/Callback_Svr test #86612
  • Multiple 'System.OutOfMemoryException' errors in .NET 7 #78959
    8.0.0
  • Zip64ExtraField should read StartDiskNumber as uint32 #31825
    8.0.0
  • [BUG] duplicate JIT code generation with readonly struct and DCE #87004
  • App crashes on device when calling static abstract interface method #86884
    8.0.0
  • Blazor WASM using 'en' culture instead of 'en-GB' when using Accept-Language header #85598
  • Developers can target macOS UI with .NET 6 #44736
    Future
  • Regression: Internal error in ILCompiler #85760
    8.0.0
  • Improve handling when setting an unseekable stream as a tar entry's DataStream #76690
    8.0.0
  • User Story: Developers using C# nullable reference types can use them with more Microsoft SDKs to validate correctness of their code #43619
    Future
  • conv.i4 with NaN returns 0 on macOS M1 #86980
  • [API Proposal]: Support for Atomic "Interlocked" operations on arbitrary length structs #80535

PullRequests

Created

  • Mark some loader tests as NativeAotIncompatible #87035
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • enable DATAS config via runtimeconfig.json #87034
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Sync comment and implementation #87033
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix calling multiple times mono_wasm_asm_loaded when webcil is enabled #87026
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono
  • Open generic enumerable resolution fix #87017 #87025
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Documentation for the HotColdMap section #87023
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-staging] [mono] Use underlying type in RuntimeHelpers.GetSpanDataFrom #87021
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 7.0.x
  • [mono] Use underlying type in RuntimeHelpers.GetSpanDataFrom #87019
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • Delete unused seed file support from PEWriter #87015
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • Add comment about NativeAot RIDs #87011
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Repurpose Gen0ReductionCount field for dynamic heap count diagnostics. #87009
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [browser][non-icu] Revert `HybridGlobalization` normalization. #87007
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Impove StringComparer.OrdinalIgnoreCase.Equals #87006
    area-System.Runtime
  • add review comment to sb files #87003
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, needs-author-action
  • Account for PredefinedCulturesOnly in CultureInfo LCID .ctor #87002
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • [browser] fix legacy interop tests #87001
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Fix multiplication instruction #86996
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Update logging with processor pipeline #86995
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • Delete various end symbols #86992
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Copy SPC.dll when BuildDll is disabled #86991
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • More test baselining #86988
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • [wasm] CI: Add more wasm specific paths #87029
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Devirtualization with multiple guesses: JIT #86809
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add individual compilation tests for each config binding overload #86910
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Revert "Revert "Change our Android build and test legs to use the new CBL-Mariner-based images."" #86967
    area-Infrastructure
  • SHA3 #84132
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Optimize jiterpreter type cast opcodes & add zero page optimizations #86928
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [wasm] Optimize constant i2/i4 shuffles in jiterpreter #86470
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Read StartDiskNumber as uint32 #83923
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Deferred failures code cleanup #86998
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Update binder gen parser to issue diagnostics for invalid input types #86856
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][build] Fix webcil obj path for publish #86994
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix typo in UMEntryThunkCode::Decode #86997
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [nativeaot][tests] Add Native AOT iOS perf scenarios #85317
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix rounding error in getLikelyClassesOrMethods #86965
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2191992 #86981
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [RISC-V] Optimize Load Immediate #86790
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Update runtime-codeql.yml to run 3x/week #86979
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Tar: Improve unseekable stream handling #84279
    area-System.Formats.Tar, 8.0.0
  • Use IUtf8SpanFormattable.TryFormat in a few more places #86931
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [wasm][build] Don't use GetTempFileName; emit webcil to subdir of obj #86972
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono

Updated

  • ApplyStartupHook diagnostic IPC command #86813
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve the performance of the type loader through various tweaks #85743
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add IHostApplicationBuilder interface #86974
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Share UTF8 converters between coreclr and mono #85558
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] Fix fingerprinting of relinked dotnet.js during build #86048
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fixing the InstructionSetDesc implications #86486
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • [wasm][debugger] Remove usage of GeneratedRegex #86911
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Enable option to use the Windows ThreadPool #85373
    area-System.Threading
  • POH allocation fix #86802
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Improve debugger performance based on JMC #86982
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Disable mark list optimization if we hit a per region mark list overflow #86508
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Added IReadOnlyDictionary to HttpRequestOptions #86983
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-staging] [mono][aot] Generate 'native-indirect' wrappers in full-aot mode. #86934
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.x
  • Adopt Microsoft.DotNet.XunitAssert fork #86193
    area-Infrastructure
  • Haiku: Configuration support #86391
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • [libs] Fix poll events conversion #86843
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][tests] Run Mono iOS sample as functional test on Helix #86578
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • TarEntry: remove some unneeded checks when extracting symbolic and hard links. #85378
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Format/Parse binary from/to BigInteger #85392
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Enable EVEX feature: embedded broadcast for Vector128/256/512.Add() in limited cases #84821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [CoreCLR] `UnsafeAccessorAttribute` non-generic support #86932
    area-VM-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Update to use the cbl-mariner webassembly images. #86806
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure
  • Save 260k in InitValueNumStoreStatics #85945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow ResolveReadyToRunCompilers to be run under FreeBSD #84250
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement collation native functions functions #86895
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Globalization, os-mac-os-x, os-ios, os-tvos
  • [mono][tests] Parallel AOT compilation of runtime tests on iOS platforms #86089
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Improving HelloiOS sample for NativeAOT to be testable with runtime packs #86652
    NO-MERGE, os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Perform the class init at runtime when static fields of BEFORE_FIELD_INIT type are accessed #86787
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Implement AsnReader.Clone #86913
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Formats.Asn1, 8.0.0
  • Enable Native AOT testing in System.Text.Json. #86975
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [mono][wasm] marshal-ilgen is dropped when not required #86035
    NO-MERGE, area-Build-mono
  • [Mono] Add the capability of trimming IL code of individual methods #86722
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Add option to decrypt Quic traffic in debug builds #83001
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Fix HTTP/1.1 concurrent request content read race condition #86715
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [browser][MT] GC, threadpool and some JS interop improvements #86759
    arch-wasm, area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • Add back cmake command-line cache on unix #86764
    area-Infrastructure
  • [browser] Unify boot config schema #86255
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [debugger][mono] Block multithreading debugger failures #86501
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Enable EventPipe support in MacOS #86766
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Add conditional substitution for IsDynamicCodeSupported when targeting ios-like platforms #86971
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios
  • [mono][infra] Upgrade iOS performance queue to OSX 13 #86574
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Implement genCodeForIncSaturate #86891
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [NativeAOT] allow creating CCW for resurrected objects #86882
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: expand qmarks earlier #86778
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Test passing struct on a border of 12bit offset #86914
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Shared framework ships runtimeconfig.json with unwanted policy settings #32969
  • [8.0.100-preview.5.23276.4]Unable to cast object of type when passing data(custom type) to a component in Blazor Apps after building #32967
  • [NETSDKE2E][Loc]With .NET8 preview 5 installed on Loc OS, the options for artifacts-path are unlocalized after running "dotnet build --help" in CLI . #32955
    8.0.1xx

Closed

  • Workload experience for out-of-tree workloads poor, especially on upgrades #30661
  • OutputPath contains double path separator leading to NU5019 in nuget pack #32971
  • `Microsoft.VisualStudio.JavaScript.Sdk` is not working outside of Windows (but it can) #32891
  • Unnecessary ApiCompat CP0001 errors when type forwards used #31271
    Backlog
  • [Package Validation] Baseline package validation should run with references #18676
    Backlog
  • ApiCompat flags introduction of a base exception type for exceptions previously inheriting from System.Exception #32922

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable error when using BinaryFormatter in GenerateResource #32981
    untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2192613 #32979
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32975
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add warning about version/distro-specific RID assets in .NET 8+ #32970
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • add review comment to sb files #32966
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Validate suppressions #32964
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Enable interceptors compiler feature when RDG is enabled #32950
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • [release/7.0.4xx] excluded containerize from source-build #32895
    Area-Containers
  • Explicitly enable BF for WinForms and WPF in Microsoft.NET.Sdk.targets #32952
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK, .NET 8.0
  • [APICompat - PackageValidation] Enable baseline assembly references #32930
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Improve errors about unsupported aot scenarios #32943
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • ApiCompat log breaking changes footer as error #32956
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat

Updated

  • [wasm] Override versions of previous runtime packs #32882
    untriaged, Area-Workloads, 8.0.1xx
  • Update the rid to the latest #32883
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Copy and Paste with double quotes is inserting backslash #68414
  • Format document does not honor final newline #68413
  • Implicitly Captured Closure - use attribute to instruct compiler to create separate DisplayClasses #68407
  • Add documentation for known Features values #68406
    17.7
  • Expand Generator ETW telemetry to include step information #68402
    17.7

Closed

  • CS0246 erroneously reported on named attribute arguments for unresolved attribute #68370
    17.7
  • dotnet format fails with "Could not load file or assembly 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis, Version=4.6.0.0...'. The system cannot find the file specified." #68115

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #68418
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Package Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Test.Utilities for razor #68417
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allocate less in GetTypeByMetadataName #68415
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid cancellation exceptions in async queue implementation #68412
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2192546 #68411
  • add review comment to sb files #68409
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.7 #68419
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix issues with pkgdef generation #68398
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Don't bind named members on missing attribute #68388
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to release/dev17.6 #68416
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to main #68405
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Clear dead links to feature branches in `Language Feature Status.md` #68317
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #68404
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • add Version.Details entries for source-build product build #68371
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Fix HasFileLocalTypes check for constructed types #68386
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use GetResult(out Exception) method for awaits #67487
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only, untriaged, Backlog
  • Don't give duplicate member error for explicit implementations of different file-local interfaces with same source name #68331
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Implement IOperation support for inline array access #68373
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Add new (hopefully easier) telemetry mechanism #68261
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Failed to execute 'insertBefore' on 'Node': Nodes of type '#text' may not be inserted inside nodes of type '#document' #48574
  • RequireLocalPort and related extensions for IEndpointConventionBuilder #48571
  • Blazor Hybrid should support the new RenderMode attribute #48568
    Backlog
  • API Proposal ComponentState.LogicalParentComponentState #48557
    8.0-preview6
  • `UserManager.AddClaimAsync` keeps throwing duplicate PK exception for new claims #48556

Closed

  • .net 6 WebAPI Template requires program.cs restructuring to add a Log Provider class #48575

PullRequests

Created

  • Reslove JsonTypeInfo<T> once per request body parameter #48573
    area-runtime
  • Expose SNI hostname in ITlsHandshakeFeature #48572
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] SupplyFromFormParameter support nested complex object bindings #48570
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] SupplyParameterFromForm complex type support. #48567
    area-blazor
  • add review comment to sb files #48566
    area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor] SupplyParameterFromForm dictionary support #48565
    area-blazor
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `d5cae28` to `68cd408` #48564
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `797b0ad` to `04cf298` #48563
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `042dd9c` to `1d1834b` #48562
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `797b0ad` to `04cf298` #48561
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [Blazor] SupplyParameterFromForm primitive collections #48559
    area-blazor

Updated

  • [Blazor] Support for primitive types in [SupplyParameterFromForm] #48432
    area-blazor
  • Sections with other features #48518
    area-blazor
  • Update RDG to use interceptors feature #48555
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • [Blazor] Take cascading parameter attribute type into account when supplying cascading values #48554
    area-blazor
  • Do not emit unused fields in RDG source #48426
    community-contribution, feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Pass through arbitrary attributes to QuickGrid #48268
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • explicitly identifying button type in QuickGrid columnbase #48277
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [Blazor] Source generator to create the discovery information at compile time. #48284
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CollectionView with default VerticalOptions: Android does not scroll, iOS incomplete scroll #15402
  • ImageSource.FromStream Leads to Crash #15397
  • CopyToAsync Value does not fall within the expected range #15396
  • MAUI Picker always open up in Android 8 and below #15394
  • [Bug] iOS Crash GroupFooterTemplate on CollectionView with Grouping #15393
  • Release 7.0.86 refers non-existing packages #15392
  • Nested Button View In A Frame Causes Crash #15391
  • ScrollView is affecting MVVM databinding in second tab of Tabbed Page for .Net 7.0 MAUI on Android API level 30 and above #15389
  • Adding UseMaui to .NET Android app hides emulators and devices #15388
  • Calling ScrollView ScrollToAsync in OnNavigatedTo event or OnAppearing event does not return. #15387
  • Downloaded file '<USER_HOME>\AppData\Local\Temp\xamarin-android-sdk\x86_64-33_r07.zip' fails checksum verification for Android SDK archive 'https://dl.google.com/android/repository/sys-img/google_apis_playstore/x86_64-33_r07.zip' #15383
  • No Android SDK instance matching the 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Android\android-sdk' path #15381

Closed

  • Label:[WinUI] FontFamily is not recognized in Unpackaged application. #9104
    .NET 8
  • Brakes ... Maui Windows so it will not startup suspected Xaml Grid Pattern with * (stars) #15276
  • Shell Flyout Issue (App ThemeBinding wont update icon) #8334
    Backlog
  • MAUI Blazor Hybrid does not respect device language on iOS for datetime #15364
  • How to destroy the webview or BlazorWebView on a page #15125
    Backlog
  • System.InvalidOperationException: InvalidOperation_ConcurrentOperationsNotSupported #15184
  • Assets file '.../MauiTutorialProject/obj/project.assets.json' not found. Run NuGet package restore to generate this file. #15215
  • xmlns can't access its classes #15217

PullRequests

Created

  • [net7.0] Update Win2D #15401
  • Android ecosytem updates #15399
  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview5] Update release branch with net8 #15398
    do-not-merge

Merged

  • [net8.0] Merge main again #15367
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Update Win2D #15400
    backport/suggested, backport/approved
  • Bump Xamarin.UITest from 4.1.3 to 4.1.4 #15354
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Add some tests for changing the app version properties #15338
  • Legacy gallery filtered solutions #15219
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net7.0] [Windows] Display alerts by Window #15386
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net7.0] Propagate title property to catalyst window #15385
  • [net7.0] [controls] fix performance issue in {AppThemeBinding} #15384
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net7.0] Call the correct Disconnect method from DisconnectHandler #15382
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net7.0] Make layout honor MaxWidth and MaxHeight requests #15380
  • [net7.0] [Android] Don't dispose connectivity listeners #15379
  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview5] [net8.0] Add insertion back #15377
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net8.0] Bump tizen to preview5 #15368
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net7.0] Run security compliance only on private build #15361
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Run security compliance only on private build #15356
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview5] [net8.0] Run security compliance only on private build #15376
  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview5] [net8.0] Bump tizen to preview5 #15375

Updated

  • Formalize virtual layout concepts and fix iOS memory leaks #15303
    area/layout 🔲
  • [CI] Remove template explosion on the maui templates build tests. #15365
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [ios] fix memory leak in Image #15062
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️
  • Scrollview on Windows doesn't measure direct child on height changed #15248
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️
  • Default ANDROID_SDK_ROOT if not set #15169

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Are there any best practices for seeding data only on a given environment? #31018
  • Remove DISTINCT inside IN/EXISTS/set operations #31016
  • DRY around getting the projection from ShapedQueryExpression #31015
  • SaveChanges fails for model with owned type iff Update was called and using Sqlite #31014

Closed

  • As of EF7 Scaffold-DbContext doesn't handle columns computed from a function #30999
  • Cosmos: Improve exception message when subquery pushdown is needed #16156
    8.0.0-preview6

PullRequests

Created

  • Uncomment test output helpers everywhere #31017

Merged

  • SDK update #30992
    auto-merge
  • Normalize Any to Contains instead of vice versa #30956
  • Fixes scaffolding on Synapse (triggers) #31011
  • Update exception message for Cosmos subquery pushdown #30849

Updated

  • Remove implicitly dependent reference #31006
  • Translate to IN + subquery when possible instead of EXISTS #30976
  • [release/6.0] Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Fix handling of queries with RETURNING clause #31013
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw from 2.1.4 to 2.1.5 #30949
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
